snippet: After 13 years, Katimi Bouare finally returned to Ivory Coast to introduce her father to his American grandchildren. But death, illness and an apartment fire plagued her homecoming at every step.
abstract: Children's Aid Society, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases fund, helps Ivory Coast immigrant Katimi Bouare of Bronx and her children with funds to replace clothing and furniture lost in 2014 fire.
lead_paragraph: After 13 years, Katimi Bouare finally returned to Ivory Coast to introduce her father to his American grandchildren. But death, illness and an apartment fire plagued her homecoming at every step.

headline.print_headline: Intent on Looking Past Tragedies for the Sake of Her Father and Children
headline.main: A Long-Awaited Homecoming, Marred by Multiple Tragedies

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
